Detailed Description

CSwordModuleSearch manages the search on Sword modules.

It manages the thread(s) and manages the different modules.

Author(s):
The BibleTime team
Version:
Id: cswordmodulesearch.h,v 1.11 2001/01/20 15:30:10 jansorg Exp
